name: Blood and Sugar
description:
Disclaimer: The current build is a work in progress. The final build will be posted by April 30.

====

Base idea:

Blood and Sugar  is a health education game where you work internally to balance the sugar levels of a type-2 diabetic by choosing the right diet, and using an insulin gun!

Point of game and who's it for

Helping people who don’t have to think about their blood sugar level, understand what it is like to have to monitor your blood sugar level.

Overview and mechanics:

The player needs to balance the sugar levels of their diabetic, and that loop emulates how a real diabetic balances their own sugar levels everyday, by:

1. Picking your diet

2.Managing your blood sugar level by:

  • Eating something to increase the level
  • Taking insulin to lower the level (Destroying fats)

Similar media:

Magic School Bus and Osmosis Jones
